title: Client re-update
body:
Due to a start-up error I was experiencing last week, I uninstalled and re-download League. 
Since then, whenever I opened the launcher I was sent to the "The client update has begun" screen and was prompted to launch the game, which sent me to the actual client where I log in.
Now for some reason I am automatically prompted into downloading the new client, which should already be downloaded. I am also unable to complete the download because an error occurs halfway through.
What should I do?

replies.body:
What kind of error are you seeing? It sounds like it might be some kind of permissions issue, which I'd suggest disabling firewalls and making sure you're running the client as admin. 

If that doesn't work, let me know what kind of errors you're seeing so we can dig a little more!
